text: Blood Arrow is a 1958 American western movie directed by Charles Marquis Warren and starring Scott Brady, Paul Richards, Phyllis Coates, Don Haggerty, Diana Darrin, Jeanne Bates. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1958 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Marquis Warren Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Blood Arrow
